verbs.description: [ARG0: The U.S. Supreme Court] [V: revived] [ARG1: the possibility of a $ 148 million price - fixing award in favor of vitamin purchasers] , [ARGM-ADV: agreeing with the Trump administration in a clash against the Chinese government] .

The U.S. Supreme Court revived the possibility of a $ 148 million [ARG1: price] - [V: fixing] award in favor of vitamin purchasers , agreeing with the Trump administration in a clash against the Chinese government .
